wrapScienceJ.config

Class GlobalOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • wrapScienceJ.config.GlobalOptions

  • public class GlobalOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    Allows to set Global Preferences for frameworks used to do the work, (e.g. image processing framework, rendering framework, GUI framework), as well as default directories and other default values related to local installation.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String m_defaultFilesDir
      Global Option to set the default directory to find images or high weight Resources, when the last directory or the default directory of the GUI Framework are not available.
      static java.lang.String m_defaultMetaDataDir
      Global Option to set the default directory to find images and configuration files, when the last directory or the default directory of the GUI Framework are not available.
      static java.lang.String m_defaultTmpDir
      Global Option to set the default directory to find images or high weight Resources, when the last directory or the default directory of the GUI Framework are not available.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GlobalOptions() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static GuiFramework getDefaultGuiFramework() 
      static ImageCoreFactory getDefaultImageWrapper() 
      static java.lang.String getDefaultInputDir()
      Specifies a default directory where images and other high weight data sets will be stored, so that in case of specification of a non absolute path, this directory will be used as root of the wrapScience Resources file system.
      static RenderTool getDefaultRenderTool() 
      static java.lang.String getDefaultTmpDir()
      Specifies a default directory where images and other high weight data sets will TEMPORARILY be stored, in case extra memory should be saved for computations.
      static java.lang.String getGlobalMetaDataDir()
      Specifies a default directory where global metadata, representing absolute default configurations and parameters (relative to the installation) will be stored, In case of specification of a non absolute path, this directory will be used as root of the wrapScience metadata file system.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        Global Option to set the default directory to find images and configuration files, when the last directory or the default directory of the GUI Framework are not available.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GlobalOptions

        public GlobalOptions()

    • Method Detail

      • getDefaultInputDir

        public static java.lang.String getDefaultInputDir()
        Specifies a default directory where images and other high weight data sets will be stored, so that in case of specification of a non absolute path, this directory will be used as root of the wrapScience Resources file system.
        Returns:
        The default directory to store data.

      • getGlobalMetaDataDir

        public static java.lang.String getGlobalMetaDataDir()
        Specifies a default directory where global metadata, representing absolute default configurations and parameters (relative to the installation) will be stored, In case of specification of a non absolute path, this directory will be used as root of the wrapScience metadata file system.
        Returns:
        The default directory to store data.

      • getDefaultTmpDir

        public static java.lang.String getDefaultTmpDir()
        Specifies a default directory where images and other high weight data sets will TEMPORARILY be stored, in case extra memory should be saved for computations.
        Returns:
        The default directory to store data.

      • getDefaultImageWrapper

        public static ImageCoreFactory getDefaultImageWrapper()
        Returns:
        the default Framework for 3D Image Pocessing

      • getDefaultGuiFramework

        public static GuiFramework getDefaultGuiFramework()
        Returns:
        the default Framework for Graphical User Interface

      • getDefaultRenderTool

        public static RenderTool getDefaultRenderTool()
        Returns:
        The default render tool.
